name: Head Laundress
description: The Head Laundress© mom shirt is for any mommy who finds herself neck-deep in never ending piles of jerseys, socks, towels and dresses to wash. "The most memorable days usually end up with the dirtiest clothes!" Mom is my uniform clean? Did you wash my black dress pants? Mom I spilled something on my shirt. Can you get it out? It never ends. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Sanitation Engineer
description: The Sanitation Engineer© mom shirt is inspired by all the moms currently on diaper and potty training duty. Job Tasks: Dodge furies of baby kicks and high velocity airborne streams of pee. Wrestle with squirming worming little ones on the changing table. Respond promptly to the phrase “MO-OOM come wipe my butt!” Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Corrections Officer
description: The Corrections Officer© mom shirt is inspired by mommies who keep the peace in their home. With the right strategies, these mommies make sure everyone is safe and separated until things cool off! Job Tasks: Read offenders their rights: “Please stay quiet for two minutes. Anything you say or do can and will be held against you in Mommy’s court. You have the right to plead your case to Daddy. If Daddy is not home, a Grandma will be appointed for you. Sweetie, do you understand these rights as they have been read to you?” Searches offenders, by pat method, to detect and confiscate candies, toys and other items disallowed in time out. Grant parole to offenders for good behavior. Once released offenders should say they’re sorry and kiss mommy. Give extra kisses and hugs to repeat offenders. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Social Coordinator
description: The Social Coordinator© mom shirt is inspired by mommies who spend their time inviting additional small children into the chaos that is “home”. Job Tasks: Promote and negotiate play date contracts in the best interest of your little one. Cold call prospective companions and maintain a full social calendar for little ones. Charm and win over other social coordinators with access to the best shovels, pails and sandboxes. Being able to travel and socialize with other social coordinators is an advantage to this job. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Bartender
description: This Bartender© mom shirt is inspired by all the mothers currently going through the bartending phase of their mommy career. Whether it be a warm soothing bottle or a chilled sippy cup of apple juice, moms are full time mixologists! Job Tasks: Collect kisses and hugs for drinks served. Attempt to limit problems and liability related to customers' excessive drinking by taking steps such as ordering naps and timeouts for cranky, in-caffinated patrons. Wash all bottles thoroughly and wipe down spilled milk. Provide snacks for patrons such as cheerios, apple slices and graham crackers. Take inventory of the formula, milk and juices at the end of the day and restock accordingly. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Marketing Director
description: The Marketing Director© mom shirt is inspired by all the moms who manage to keep their sanity throughout the checkout-lane tantrums, the candy-aisle bribes and the wails and wiggles in the shopping cart seat. Job Tasks: Plan shopping trips ahead of time to avoid conflict with nap and feeding times. Locate nearest bathroom as you will surely make two visits there. Chase toddlers down aisles 6, 7, and 8. Repeat. Restock soup cans that your toddler reorganized on the store floor while somehow keeping an eye on the little one who is trying to stand up in the shopping cart. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Toy Repair Specialist
description: The Toy Repair Specialist© tee is inspired by mommies who spend time fixing toy cars, replacing batteries, and combing the tangled hair of countless Barbie dolls. Job Tasks: Prepare for the busiest day of your year, December 26th. Comfort little ones upon the decapitation of superhero action figures. Styles the hair of naked, armless Barbies. Retrieve Hot Wheels cars that have gone missing. Bandage missing eyes and ears on stuffed animals. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Scary Monster Hunter
description: The Scary Monster Hunter© mom shirt is inspired by all the brave mommies who spend their nights performing closet checks and chasing away scary creatures under their little one's beds. Job Tasks: Inspect premises to identify whether the monster infestation is occurring under the bed, downstairs, or in the closet. Appoint a team of stuffed animals to your little one’s night watch team. Direct and/or assist little ones in treatment and extermination processes to prevent the reoccurrence of a monster infestation. Product Details: Pre-shrunk heavyweight 5.4 oz. 100% cotton Shoulder-to-shoulder tape and seamless collarette Double-needle neck, sleeve and bottom hem Fashion cut for women with 5/8" rib collar and fitted tapered sleeve Sizing Info: Small: Women's Size 4-6 Medium: Women's Size 8-10 Large: Women Size 12-14 X-Large: Women's Size 16-18

name: Your Design Here
description:
Help us out, tell us more about the job of a mommy and submit an idea to our design team. If your design is selected we will send you TWO free shirts. You'll recieve your suggested design and one of the MommyAtHeart.com original shirts! Your $5.00 donation will be on us!
